Ring structures don't work so well in KSP due to the tree structure used to describe part relations. The only way to make that last connection is with docking ports or struts.

Just FYI, "clipping" in the debug menu and KSP in general usually refers to fitting one part inside another rather than just connecting.

The ship itself cannot contain any part loops.

Use a pair of docking ports to make that last connection.

Docking ports should (well, can) bypass this limitation.

A nice pile of struts can also make your problem disappear, not by actually solving it but by making the loose parts too scared to move visibly.
